rajaye rohalwala waidyawarun siya rajakari katayuthuwalin iwath wemin ada (04) dina sita kriyathmaka kirimata niyamithawa thibu wada warjanaya athhituwamin warana niyogayak kolambaa disa adhikaranaya eeye (3) nikuth kale ya.kolambaa jathika rohala, palath, disthrik, pradeshiya ha gramiya rohalwala shikshana rohalwala ha wishesha rohalwala waidyawarun samajikathwaya darana rajaye waidya niladharin ge sangamayata me waranaya nikuth kerini.shri jayawardhanapura maha rohale swasanashi්ratha rogayakata sayanika prathikara labana nugegoda padinchi juliyana dahanayaka mahathmiya pawaru naduwak salaka balu kolambaa pradhana disa winisuru ranjith en.

me sanwardhana wyapruthiya sarthakawa awasan kirimath samanga pollabadda, galwalayaya, niloya, samangipura, kahalawinna, badirakka saha borapola athulu pradesha rasaka janathawata paniya jalaya, rohal, pasal, marga, krushikarma menma saththwa palanaya athulu kshethra rasaka prathilabha ath weyi.mehidi wadiduratath adahas palakaramin mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sadahan kale, eda tha්rasthawadayen rata nidahas kara gaththa sema ada niyangayen sa ginnen rate daruwanwa nidahas karagena ema daruwanta nidahase jiwathwanna puluwan wathawaranayak hadala dima ape balaporoththuwa bawath me wanawita ratapura dawantha wariyojana krama athuluwa wyapruthi rasak kriyathmaka wana bawathya.

pilithuru inima krida kala rajasthan royals kandayama panduwara 15 k thula ek kadullak pamanak dawi jayagrahi ilakkaya pasukarayamata samathwiya.ehidi hathare pahara 16k saha haye pahara 2 k samagin wishishta inimak krida kala mayikal lamb lakunu 83 k himikaragaththeya. kolkata nayitrayidars kandayama ha dilli deyadewils kandayama athara pawathi tharagaye kasiye wasiya dinagaththe kolkata nayitrayidars kandayamaya.ee anuwa kolkata nayitrayidars kandayama prathamayen panduwata paharadimata thiranaya kala athara niyamitha panduwara 20 awasanaye kadulu 3 k pamanak dawi lakunu 181 k labaganimata samathwiya.ehidi sawraw ganguli lakunu 56 k labagath athara andru mathiws nodawi lakunu 46 k labagaththeya.pilithuru inima krida kala dilli deyadewils kandayamata niyamitha panduwara 20 awasanaye kadulu 8 k dawi labagatha hakiwuye lakunu 167k pamani.ehidi wirendra shewag lakunu 64 k saha ෙgrutham gambhir lakunu 47 k labaganimata samathwiya.tharagaye wiraya sammanaya himiwuye kolkata nayitrayidars kandayame sawraw gangulitaya.

abhimanawath menma dawantha aakarayata sithannata ithihasayen anubala labu apa jathiya saundarya rasaswadayak athiwa godanangimata shakthiya athi minisun bihi karannata me rangahalata haki bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiweya.wathman rajaya ape rate janathawage bhauthika jiwithaya godanangime karyaye di apramadawa katayuthu karanawak menma siyalu jathinge eksathkama wani yodha karyayanwala yedena bawa janadhipathiwaraya sihipath kaleya.saraswathiya wada sitina parishuddhathwaye sankethaya wana ‘‘nelumata’’ shri lankikayan menma desha deshantharawala jathinge sith prabodhamath kirimata hethu wewa yayi janadhipathiwaraya prarthana kaleya.china samuhanduwe deshapalana upadeshaka kamituwe upa sabhapathi shang miyinag, janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha, kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha, agawinisuru shirani bandaranayaka mahathma mahathmihu athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ekwuha..
